ModMetaData.name: Prison Commons (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Ben Lubar
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Ben Lubars mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630896782
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://discord.gg/h5TY6DA][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/PrisonCommons][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/h5VwTNL.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
Allows you to mark any enclosed Gather Spot (table, sculpture, campfire, etc) as a prison commons area.
Prison commons areas act as part of the prison, allowing prisoners to freely enter through doors.
Having trouble with prison breaks due to door count? [url=https://imgur.com/a/Is44BA5]Check out this guide by Lurmey.[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Log Uploader[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2898000489][img]https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/emipa606/PrisonCommons?label=latest%20version&style=plastic&color=9f1111&labelColor=black[/img][/url] | tags: prison management
